title: Product
description: XDM product variant, master product and key attributes of product in the product catalog.

xdm:id.title: Identifier
xdm:id.description: The internal unique ID of the variant in the commerce backend system.

xdm:SKU.title: SKU
xdm:SKU.description: The unique SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) of the variant assigned by the vendor.

xdm:description.title: Description
xdm:description.description: The localized description of the product.

xdm:category.title: Category
xdm:category.description: Primary categorization (category) name of the Master/variant.

xdm:department.title: Department
xdm:department.description: Primary department the product is associated with.

xdm:masterProductId.title: Master Product Identifier
xdm:masterProductId.description: The internal unique ID of the product in the commerce backend system.

xdm:masterProductSKU.title: Master Product SKU
xdm:masterProductSKU.description: The unique SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) of the master product assigned by the vendor or manufacturer(to update).

xdm:masterProductName.title: Master Product Name
xdm:masterProductName.description: The localized name of the product.

xdm:fabrication.title: Fabrication
xdm:fabrication.description: Primary material the product is constructed with.

xdm:gender.title: Gender
xdm:gender.description: Gender the product is marketed to. [male,female,unisex,unknown].

xdm:size.title: Size
xdm:size.description: Standard product size for the product.

xdm:unitOfMeasure.title: Unit of Measure
xdm:unitOfMeasure.description: Standard unit of measure of the varient. Denotes the units for the size measurement.

xdm:countryOfOrigin.title: Country of Origin
xdm:countryOfOrigin.description: Country of origin as defined by customs requirements.

xdm:COGS.title: Cost of Good Sold
xdm:COGS.description: Cost of Good Sold. In the currencyCode currency.

xdm:listPrice.title: List Price
xdm:listPrice.description: Default price of the product before sales and discounting. In the currencyCode currency.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency Code
xdm:currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used for cost and pricing.

xdm:originalSaleDate.title: Original Sale Date
xdm:originalSaleDate.description: First date the product was made available for sale. The time using RFC3339 with a stated timezone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:productCreateDate.title: Product Creation Date
xdm:productCreateDate.description: The date when this product varient was created. The time using RFC3339 with a stated timezone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:productLastModified.title: Product Last Modified
xdm:productLastModified.description: The date when this product varient was last modified. The time using RFC3339 with a stated timezone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:productURL.title: Product URL
xdm:productURL.description: The URL for the primary Product View of the product varient page.
